card.name: Atsuto, Duel Hero Strategist
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: The Lost, Dark Armor
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Noron Up, "Question 2"
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards.

card.name: Dupoiz, Darma
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Obuza 08, Demon Dragon Armored/Beginning of the End
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your creatures in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each creature in your graveyard until the End Step ========================= ■ Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bikkureeno
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it. ■ Destroy this creature when your opponent uses a card that has "shield trigger". ■ End Step

card.name: Dododo Dopydope
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard 2 cards.

card.name: Rockyrock
card.text: ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, gacharange summon. That gacharange creature is put into the battle zone tapped. Gacharange Summon ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: TS-10, Shell
card.text: ■ Mana Drive 3 (Water): If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is water civilization, this creature gets "blocker". ''(You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of an opponent's creature to that creature.)'' ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Ceremony of Graveyard
card.text: ■ When you put a card in your graveyard, if you have 8 or more cards in your graveyard, you may link this Zeron Nebula to your Zerom, Origin of Destruction. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the End Step

card.name: Ceremony of Hands
card.text: ■ At the End Step

card.name: Ceremony of Resurrection
card.text: ■ When you put a card from your graveyard, you may link this Zeron Nebula to your Zerom, Origin of Destruction. If you do, put 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Ceremony of Destruction
card.text: ■ When a creature is destroyed, if 2 or more other creatures were destroyed this turn, you may link this Zeron Nebula to your Zerom, Origin of Destruction. If you do, return a darkness card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Zeron
card.text: ■ World Breaker ■ When this creature is Zeron Birthed, your opponent's creatures have 0 power until the End Step ■ While this creature has 0 power or less, it can't leave the battle zone and Win All Battles ■ If this card is in a zone other than the battle zone, you lose the game.

card.name: Zeron
card.text: ■ World Breaker ■ When this creature is Zeron Birthed, your opponent's creatures have 0 power until the End Step ■ While this creature has 0 power or less, it can't leave the battle zone and Win All Battles ■ If this card is in a zone other than the battle zone, you lose the game.

card.name: Zerom, Origin of Destruction
card.text: ■ Cards that can be put into the Battle Zone at the start of the game ■ Cards that can be put into the Battle Zone at the start of the game ■ Zeron cards can't leave the battle zone. ■ Zeron Birth: When you link 4 Zeron Nebula with this card, flip all 5 cards to its Zeron

card.name: Hei-Sanshiki, Tomurai
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's graveyard. Your opponent puts them on the bottom of their deck in any order. ■ Gacharange Reminder

card.name: Helegrigory-Zeroshiki
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your other gacharange creatures.

card.name: Dugenda, Gig
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards then discard 2 cards.

card.name: Turbo Cho, Climb
card.text: ■ Mugen Climb ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

card.name: Ze-ro, Darkness King
card.text: ■ Instead of paying the cost, you may discard 3 darkness cards from your hand and destroy 3 of your darkness creatures to cast this spell. ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a darkness creature from your graveyard.

card.name: Zagaan GR, Knight of Darkness
card.text: ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Dragon Head Nebula Man/Zero Birthday
card.text: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your water or darkness cards in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them. ■ Triple Breaker ========================= ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your creatures. Then destroy one of your opponent's creatures.
